content.description:
This delicate problem starts immediately right of

Resonated

and shares the same jug and top out as for

Resonated

. The moves flow very nice up and left, and it has an amazing sequence of holds. It is best in winter when creek is frozen. This is in a nice, sunny spot.

This is the hanging slab facing the creek, in between

Resonated

and

The 8th

. Creep out onto a rock in the river and jump up to a jug, mantle, and climb the fun slab above. It is really fun!
content.protection: It depends on if the creek is frozen or not...if it is, you're shallow water soloing.

content.description:
Start matched on small crimps on the left rail of "

The 8th

", and dyno left to a massive jug creating a near horizontal swing. The landing is covered in water when the river is high. Once controlled on the jug, a V6 sequence to get up onto the victory slab awaits. UPDATE: static beta has been done making the dyno a harder eliminate variation.
content.protection: A few pads when the landing is dry.
content.location:
The route starts on the left rail of "

The 8th

" and heads left.

content.description: Resonated starts low on the left side of the boulder and moves right and up the arete. It has a good mix of crimps, slopers, dynamic movement, and control. This definitely has a crux move but is pretty sustained to the top.
content.location: This is located on the Water Rock. Start low on the southwest face, and move across a few holds to the right before heading up the arete.

content.description: Traverse across the sloping arete. Mantle onto the slab underneath the large boulder at the end. Keep your ass off the grass!
content.protection: At least 4 pads and multiple spotters. If you punt off the mantle, you're done for.
content.location: It is on the low angle slab that you walk down to get to the Water Rock Boulder.

content.description:
This thin problem climbs the face just right of

Vibrant

problem, between

Vibrant

and

Horan's Highball

. A delicate foot sequence is used to gain a mono and two finger niche eventually leading to better crimps to gain the summit. This is a favorite.
content.protection: Pads and spotters, walk off the east side.
content.location: It is located on Water Rock.

content.description:
Start right of the

Resonated

and

Vibrant

problems and climb a sheer, delicate face to summit. It is a sweet face with a flat landing, onto ice during winter months.  It is over the water during warmer months.

A traverse, moving left, in from the from the V0 scoop problem has been done.  It is a thriller of a highball, stack the pads.
content.location: It is on Water Rock, Eldorado Canyon.

content.description:
This is the arete on the opposite side of

Resonated

. It consists of some compression climbing on slopers, pinches, and a cobble or two. Start on the left side of the arete, with a long first move out to a squeeze. It has kind of a poor landing....
content.protection: I used 2 Mondo pads and an Impact.
